statements: SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk_assessment;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 5;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio_risk_assessment ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE risk_score < 3 ORDER BY investment_id ASC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_type FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 5 ORDER BY risk_score ASC
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, risk_score FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE investment_type = 'Bonds' AND risk_score < 3
SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk_assessment WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 3 AND 7
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment_amount FROM portfolio_risk_assessment GROUP BY investment_type
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_id FROM portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT risk_level, assessment_id FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT assessment_id, portfolio_name FROM risk_assessment JOIN portfolio ON risk_assessment.portfolio_id = portfolio.portfolio_id;
SELECT portfolio_id, COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM risk_assessment GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM portfolio JOIN risk_assessment ON portfolio.portfolio_id = risk_assessment.portfolio_id;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT risk_level, portfolio_name FROM risk_assessment ra JOIN portfolio p ON ra.portfolio_id = p.portfolio_id WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_id > 5 ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, risk_level FROM portfolio p LEFT JOIN risk_assessment ra ON p.portfolio_id = ra.portfolio_id WHERE risk_level IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM portfolio_assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk WHERE risk_score < 0.5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM portfolio_assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM portfolio_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_id > 5 ORDER BY factor_name DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM risk_factors WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(factor_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_risk JOIN portfolio_assets ON portfolio_risk.asset_id = portfolio_assets.asset_id WHERE portfolio_risk.risk_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table2;
SELECT column3, column4 FROM table3 WHERE column6 = true;
SELECT column5, column6 FROM table4 ORDER BY column7 DESC;
SELECT column8, column7 FROM table2 WHERE column4 LIKE 'A%';
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1 WHERE column1 > 100 ORDER BY column1 DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT column3, column4 FROM table2 WHERE column4 LIKE '%test%' AND column3 BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY column4 ASC;
SELECT column5, column6 FROM table3 WHERE column5 >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY column6 DESC;
SELECT column7, column8 FROM table4 WHERE column8 < 50.5 ORDER BY column7 ASC, column8 DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT column1, column2, column3, column4, column5 FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.column1 = table2.column3 WHERE table1.column2 = 'example' AND table2.column4 = 'sample';
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolios WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_name FROM portfolios;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM holdings GROUP BY portfolio_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolios
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolios WHERE total_value > 5000
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolios WHERE total_value < 1000 ORDER BY total_value DESC

SELECT portfolios.portfolio_id, assets.asset_name, holdings.quantity FROM holdings JOIN portfolios ON holdings.portfolio_id = portfolios.portfolio_id JOIN assets ON holdings.asset_id = assets.asset_id

SELECT portfolios.portfolio_name, assets.asset_type, holdings.quantity, assets.asset_value FROM portfolios JOIN holdings ON portfolios.portfolio_id = holdings.portfolio_id JOIN assets ON holdings.asset_id = assets.asset_id WHERE holdings.quantity > 100 ORDER BY assets.asset_value ASC
